TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventWatcherOptions extends System.Management.ManagementOptions

summary.span: 指定用于管理事件监视的选项。

span.span: Specifies options for management event watching.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示在创建**Win32_Process**的实例时客户端如何收到通知，因为事件类是 **__InstanceCreationEvent**的。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows Management Instrumentation](/windows/desktop/wmisdk/wmi-start-page)文档。For more information, see the [Windows Management Instrumentation](/windows/desktop/wmisdk/wmi-start-page) documentation. 客户端通过调用 方法来同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在运行此代码示例的同时，可以启动进程（如记事本）来测试此示例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. [!code-csharp[wminet_EventWatcherOptions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EventWatcherOptions/cs/EventWatcherOptions.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_EventWatcherOptions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EventWatcherOptions/vb/EventWatcherOptions.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化监视事件的 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for event watching.

summary.span: 使用默认值为事件监视初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for event watching, using default values.

summary.span: 这就是无参数构造函数。

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 部分信任的程式碼無法使用此成員。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code). ## Examples 下面的示例演示在创建**Win32_Process**的实例时客户端如何收到通知，因为事件类是 **__InstanceCreationEvent**的。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows Management Instrumentation](/windows/desktop/wmisdk/wmi-start-page)文档。For more information, see the [Windows Management Instrumentation](/windows/desktop/wmisdk/wmi-start-page) documentation. 客户端通过调用 方法来同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在运行此代码示例的同时，可以启动进程（如记事本）来测试此示例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. param.name: context
param.span: 包含要传递给提供程序的、提供程序特定的信息的选项上下文对象。

span.span: The options context object containing provider-specific information to be passed through to the provider.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 等待下一个事件的超时时间。

span.span: The time-out to wait for the next events.

param.name: blockSize
param.span: 每个块中要等待的事件数。

span.span: The number of events to wait for in each block.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int BlockSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.BlockSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置块操作的块大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the block size for block operations.

summary.span: 等待事件时，此值指定返回前要等待多少事件。

span.span: When waiting for events, this value specifies how many events to wait for before returning.

value.span: 一个整数值，指示操作块的块大小。

span.span: An integer value indicating the block size for a block of operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value 默认值为 1。The default value is 1. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 部分信任的程式碼無法使用此成員。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code). ## Examples 下面的示例演示在创建**Win32_Process**的实例时客户端如何收到通知，因为事件类是 **__InstanceCreationEvent**的。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows Management Instrumentation](/windows/desktop/wmisdk/wmi-start-page)文档。For more information, see the [Windows Management Instrumentation](/windows/desktop/wmisdk/wmi-start-page) documentation. 客户端通过调用 方法来同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在运行此代码示例的同时，可以启动进程（如记事本）来测试此示例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running.
